# JSON Instructions

## Overview

This document provides best practices for working with JSON files in WordPress block themes and plugins.

---

## 1. Structure & Formatting

- Use 2-space indentation.
- Use double quotes for all keys and string values.
- Validate JSON with online tools or CLI (e.g., `jq`, `ajv`).

---

## 2. Best Practices

- Keep JSON files small and modular.
- Use comments in documentation, not in JSON files (JSON does not support comments).
- Validate all JSON files before committing.

---

- [json.instructions.md](https://github.com/lightspeedwp/ai-block-theme-template/blob/develop/.github/instructions/json.instructions.md)
